Package ohos.aafwk.abilityjet.activedata

Class DataObserver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.abilityjet.activedata.DataObserver<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Indicates the type of data to observe.

    public abstract class DataObserver<T>
extends Object
    A base class of observers that receive notifications upon data changes of ActiveData.

    Observers of ActiveData must inherit this class and override the onChanged(java.lang.Object) method. In this way, ActiveData can notify observers of data changes by using onChanged(java.lang.Object).

    DataObserver holds a Lifecycle object by using the setLifecycle(ohos.aafwk.ability.Lifecycle) method. The object indicates the lifecycle of the matching Ability or AbilitySlice. DataObserver also allows ActiveData to observe its lifecycle changes. Therefore, DataObserver and ActiveData observe each other. DataObserver observes data changes of ActiveData, and ActiveData observes lifecycle changes of DataObserver.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITYJET

        public DataObserver​()

    • Method Detail

      • onChanged

        public abstract void onChanged​(T value)
        Notifies an observer that the data being observed has changed.

        Observers of ActiveData must implement this method so that they can be notified upon data changes.

        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the new value of the data being observed. This parameter cannot be null.

      • setLifecycle

        public final void setLifecycle​(Lifecycle owner)
        Sets the lifecycle state of an observer.

        The ActiveData object will be notified when the lifecycle state of an observer changes.

        Parameters:
        owner - Indicates the lifecycle state of the observer. This parameter cannot be null.
